description.narrative: This activity (UK Aid Match Grants) is a component of UK Aid Match: backing public choices on aid spending reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £42,510,727. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Health policy and administrative management, Water sector policy and administrative management, Social Protection, Business Policy and Administration, Agricultural development, Agricultural land resources, Environmental education/training. , with the following implementing partners: AAUK, Action Against Hunger (UK), Catholic Agency For Overseas Development (CAFOD), Charity Projects Ltd (Comic Relief), Christian Aid, Islamic Relief Worldwide, Opportunity International, PEAS (Promoting Equality in African Schools), READ Foundation, Retrak, Riders for Health, Save the Children UK, Sightsavers, Trócaire (Northern Ireland), UNICEF (UK), WaterAid, World Vision UK. The start date is 04-04-2011 and the end date is 30-11-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - policy, planning and administration
Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - policy, planning and administration
Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - research/ education and training
General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - Economic Affairs - General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - investment promotion
Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - policy, planning and administration
Water supply and Sanitation - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Water supply and Sanitation - policy, planning and administration
